fields.notesFormatted:
Life lessons

  1. Eventually, every knee will bow.

Philippians 2:9-10, Revelation 5:13, Romans 14:11, Isaiah 45:23

  1. God doesn't need our help, but he blesses our cooperation.

James 4:6-10, 1 Peter 5:5-7, Hebrews 11:6

  1. Our greatest strength can become our crippling weakness. Our crippling weakness can become our greatest strength.

2 Corinthians 12:7-10, Psalm 119:67-71, Hebrews 12:5-12

  1. It's never too late to submit - There's always a "Plan B."

Jeremiah 18:1-8, Matthew 22:32
